text: Hello! My name is Raviprakash Chandak and I am a highly skilled and experienced software engineer. I have a bachelor's degree in computer science from National University of Singapore and over 4 years of professional experience in the industry. I am currently working at Apple. Previously I have worked at Grab and Goldman Sachs. Throughout my career, I have gained expertise in a wide range of programming languages and technologies, including Java, Go and Python. I am skilled in both front-end and back-end development, and have a strong understanding of software design principles and best practices. I have a proven track record of successfully leading software development projects from start to finish, with a focus on delivering results that meet business needs and exceed customer expectations. I am an excellent communicator and team player, able to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to ensure the success of projects.
